channel.title: Homes on Aditya Chandupatla
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Aditya Chandupatla

item.description: Biography A highly driven individual with a demonstrated history of working in a couple of MNC’s as a Software Engineer. I bring academic expertise coupled with Industry best-practises to the table. I’m fascinated by the impact of Data Science on the tech community, and I am Actively looking for opportunities to work in the areas of Deep Learning, Natural Language Processing, and Computer Vision. Currently, I am working in Teradata with DBE-TIES team.

item.title: Quora
item.description: My primary motive to write on Quora is to help those in need by providing as much information and insights as I can from my experience. Consequently, I aspire to improve my writing skills. Constructive criticism is welcome. By and large, I write about Computer Science, AI, Jobs & careers, Undergraduate studies, Technology and Marvel movies. Here is a selected list of my Quora answers: How does logistic regression work (step by step)?

item.title: Medium Articles
item.description: I have recently started writing on Medium in order to share my technical knowledge to the world. Technologies with which I’ll be associated are: Deeplearning, Computer Vision, NLP, Java, C/C++, Python & R. Here are my published articles: Asymptotic Analysis and comparison of sorting algorithms A group chat application in Java Don’t want to miss out? Start Following
